alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Scott, southwestern Yell and north central Montgomery Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Muddy Creek WMA, or 15 miles north of Mount Ida, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gravelly... Muddy Creek WMA... Nola... Chula... Harvey... Bluffton... Blue Ball... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest
